full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DAM CAN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO'I BZLOG BSGYUR RKYEN NGAN SEL BYED ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003B (CES 'JAM DPAL GSHIN RJE GSHED KYI BKA' SDOD DAM CAN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO'I BZLOG BSGYUR RKYEN NGAN SEL BYED ZHES BYA BA @004A *, ,'DI NI KHA CIG GIS 'JAM DPAL GSHIN RJE GSHED KYI BZLOG BSGYUR ZER BA DE LA CHOS RGYAL GYI BZLOG BSGYUR ZHES MING BTAGS NAS TSIG MI MTHUN PA CIG BYAS PA MONG YOD PA DANG, CHOS KYI RGYAL GYI BZLOG BSGYUR YIG RNYING MA RNYED PA DANG, SNGA MO NAS DON GNYER CAN 'GAS BSKUL ZHING, SLAR YANG SMAN PA BLO BZANG BKRA SHIS KYIS SBYIN BDAG GI RIM GROR DGOS PA CHE ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGO MA CHOG PAR, RANG DANG SKAL MNYAM GZHAN LA'ANG PHAN PA AE SRID SNYAM PAS SLOB GNYER MA BYAS PA'I BLO LHUN SNYING KHAMS CAN CHOS RJE BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS MING CAN GYIS GONG MA RNAMS KYI GSUNG RGYUN LA BRTEN NAS SUG BRIS SU BGYIS PA'O, 'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG, ,,DGE'O, ,MANGGA LAm, ,)
